citations.narrative:
Section 2.38(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: Each research facility shall, during business
hours, allow APHIS officials: (1) To enter its place of business.
A facility representative was not available to allow access at 11:40 a.m. on 08/27/2015.
Accompanied on inspection by Dr. Alexandra Andricos, VMO.
Additional Inspectors
Andricos Alexandra, Veterinary Medical Officer
